name: OurBus
0: ”Alexa, ask OurBus where I can travel to from Boston.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: our bus
des: Finding the right transportation makes it possible to connect with the people, events and opportunities that are important to you. OurBus created a passenger-centric network of intercity, charter and commuter bus routes that have helped over 500,000 people get where they want to go. Now, you can ask OurBus about routes ("Where can I travel to from Boston?"), prices ("How much does it cost to travel from Ithaca to NYC?") and general information about what will make your travel experience different with us ("What are the benefits included with OurBus trips?"). Enjoy the ride!
